oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Medal for Pilgrimage of Mothers and Widows
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: This bronze colored medal features a central five pointed star surrounded by a wreath of oak leaves and laurel and surmounted flags and the Great Seal. The suspension is blue, white and red vertical striped silk attached to a rectangular bronze colored mount engraved "Mrs. Sarah F. Ring/ Tennessee." The reverse of the medal is marked "7086." Sarah Frances Ring of Franklin, lost her son, Pvt. Frank M. Ring, Co. A, 114th MG Battn., 30th Div in October 1918 while fighting in France.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: World War, 1914-1918; World War, 1914-1918 - History
